text: Through you the blind will seeThrough you the mute will singThrough you the dead will riseThrough you all hearts will praiseThrough you the darkness fleesThrough you my heart screams I am freeI am free I am free to dance.I am free to live for you.I am free to live for you.I am free. 中文字幕由 Amara.org 社群提供 繁體中文，臺灣國語。
